original_text: And he shall offer the ram for a sacrifice of peace offerings unto the Lord, with the basket of unleavened bread: the priest shall offer also his meat offering, and his drink offering.
korean_text: 화목제물로 숫양에 무교병 한 광주리를 아울러 여호와께 드리고 그 소제와 전제를 드릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: And he shall offer the ram
for a sacrifice of peace offerings
with the basket of unleavened bread
the priest shall offer also his meat offering
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 또한 그의 소제물을 드릴 것이며
